Author: unfortunatelyim
Text: I do all the cooking/menu control for my cafe and honestly doing it every day, and bringing my own food to work for lunch has made me not even view our food as edible lol. it's not that it isnt, I'm proud to serve what I do but that's not my food that's  customers food. same with all the cakes we sell. it's all stock that we need to make money on is how I see it. coffee on the other hand... I'm making myself unlimited coffees on the daily lmao
